meanings.definition: An item that is part of a larger item.
meanings.sent1: The subitem was a small piece of the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: I found a subitem hidden in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The subitem tried to hide behind the bigger items.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was a subitem of her elegant outfit.
meanings.sent5: The subitem was like a tiny treasure waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: A smaller item within a larger category.
meanings.sent1: The subitem was listed under the main category.
meanings.sent2: I need to find a subitem in the grocery store.
meanings.sent3: The subitem felt like a small fish in a big pond.
meanings.sent4: His joke was a subitem of the larger conversation.
meanings.sent5: The subitem stood out like a colorful gem in a sea of gray.
